title: @Riot - Jinx's mouth open 24/7 on the login screen is creepy
body:
Dear Riot,

Please change the log in screen so that Jinx's mouth is not always open. I feel that this is unnatural and not to mention uncomfortable.
Let's think about it, if you were flying along on a rocket, yeah sure I guess you'd open your mouth every once in a while to let out a "WOO HOO"; but other than that could you imagine the dry mouth that you'd get from all the air being forced down your pie hole?
OH WAIT, I forgot, the bugs would moisten your mouth up, mmmmhmmm yummy bugs in my tummy.
Or you know, maybe stop the eyes from moving, that'd make it less creepy. I feel like she's just creeping on me as I'm trying to type my password, it makes it an uncomfortable experience and I'm actually crying right now as I'm attempting to log in because it's just that scary.

In short, please stop the eyes moving or let her close her mouth. 

Thanks,

Your bestest friend in the world,

Rawrskyes
